content.para: Release 4.0.0 brings major API changes, cleanups, dependency upgrades and more!

td.p: Carrot2 version 4.0.0 comes with a redesigned, modernized and simplified API. Please take a look at the new documentation and examples as they provide the best guidance on porting existing code (or writing new code)
A new search frontend demo is available and it works directly on top of the DCS service (HTTP/JSON service layer).

A number of things have been removed in order to simplify the project and its code base (as well as downstream user code): controllers, document sources. Sadly, this also includes the Workbench, for which there is currently no replacement. We're considering options on how to revive a tuning/ demo application which could serve the needs Workbench fulfilled previously.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
